title: Bug 114905: Default value is lost in list box of report parameter after modifying it
description:
Description: The default value set in the list box of the report parameter is lost after modifying it.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Create a new report parameter.
2. Set the Display type to List Box.
3. Input three values: 'aa', 'bb', 'cc' and set 'aa' as the default value. Click OK.
4. Reopen the Edit Parameter dialog, modify the default value 'aa' to 'aaa' and click OK directly.
5. Reopen the Edit Parameter dialog.

Observed Behavior (OB): The default value set in the list box of the report parameter is lost after modifying it.

Expected Behavior (EB): The modified default value 'aaa' should be retained in the list box of the report parameter.

Steps to Reproduce (SR):
1. Create a new report parameter.
2. Set the Display type to List Box.
3. Input three values: 'aa', 'bb', 'cc' and set 'aa' as the default value. Click OK.
4. Reopen the Edit Parameter dialog, modify the default value 'aa' to 'aaa' and click OK directly.
5. Reopen the Edit Parameter dialog.
